davidy12 said:

Yes he did, I asked him to because I couldn't get Kerbalstuff to work on my computer

Textures still look a little rough-made from the picture given. Adding more details, and itty-bitty thing may help. And, BTW, adding some normal maps can help bring up the detains a lot.

For the FX, you can try steal some stuff from HotRockets. Or, at least support for HotRockets.

Good to see someone made a MOD of the rocket from my country,THX:cool:

And I can help if you need some more info about Long March 9

PS: In chinese Taiyang Shen simply means "Apollo":sticktongue:

Good to see someone made a MOD of the rocket from my country,THX:cool:

And I can help if you need some more info about Long March 9

PS: In chinese Taiyang Shen simply means "Apollo":sticktongue:

You're welcome! It also includes nice CLEP fairings for the ProceduralFairings mod.

AND IÃ¢â‚¬Ëœm really looking forward to see the RSS version of Long March 9!

Here's some imformation of the fullscale Long March 9:

1st stage:4* 6370kn LOX/RP1 engine,propellant mass 1768T

booster:4*liquid booster,one 6370kn LOX/RP1 engine with booster,propellant mass 320T

2st stage:2*1980kn LOX/LH engine,propellant mass 500T

Total mass:4100T

LEO payload:130T

Combining would be great, with the hermes pack and the rover pack.

Also, don't make the Delta XI an Atlas V like in the movie, create your own.
Just make it an uprated SLS block 2.
Me and kart are making a really cool Delta IX that we saw a picture of

Me and kart are making a really cool Delta IX that we saw a picture of
Will you show us?
When kart has his upper stage, yeah

When kart has his upper stage, yeah

Good to see someone made a MOD of the rocket from my country,THX:cool:

So... Are they based off the SLS?
Taiyang Shen is a Chinese rocket based on the long march 5, and Delta IX is ULA's answer to SpaceX's Falcon XX
You should collaborate with the dudes making the Hermes mod to make a full "The Martian" mod. Obviously you must name the resulting mod "The Dunatian".
Already working on this. The Dunatian was the original name but didn't sound cool enough
No, I meant what does it look like?
